description:
"She has nice titties!"
You can tell Kendall is really into his current girlfriend as that is just one of the many nice things he had to say about her. I think it's cute how he gets such a gleam in his eyes when he talks about how much he loves to be with her.
They met in school.
"She's a soccer player so her legs are amazing," he said. "And, she'll pretty much get naked in front of anyone!"
Kendall is 19 and he's studying to become a psychologist.
"All through high school, everyone wanted to talk to me about their problems," he explained. "I've always been pretty good with helping them."
He works as a lifeguard at a municipal pool in order to put himself through school. I bet he looks hot in his little swim suit!
title: Kendall
